name: Leopold's Tavern

review.reviewBody: Dang that was a good burger! The Juke Burger was the perfect Friday night meal, the crispy onions were perfect, and cheese curds? Hell yes. And it was a good size too. Definitely on my favourite list now!
Best delivery club sandwich I've ever had, and the Buffalo wings were delicious. thanks for sending the sauce separately so they didn't sog up!

This Korean Burger of the Month  is SO bomb, it's my favorite in Vancouver right now. Large and potentially messy (I add blue cheese dip), it's two thick patties and thick cut bacon make for a super appetizing meal and the Korean flavors are out of this world. I wish it were here to stay!

Large portions of food that actually tastes amazing! 
This Korean burger of the month is definitely top 3 best burgers I've ever eaten, and best I've had in Vancouver. So good I had to get it again the next day to confirm
Th Chicken Fingers were not looking fresh and the fries were AWFUL! This is for sure the first and last time for me to order from this store!
